name: Shadow Fey Poisoner
description: The Shadow Fey Poisoner is a cunning, agile humanoid dressed in studded leather armor, skilled in stealth and deceit, capable of becoming invisible in dim light or darkness.
memorable: Its deadly sneak attacks and powerful poison abilities make it a dangerous foe in combat, with strong evasion and teleportation tactics.
goals: To ambush foes and eliminate targets through stealth and cunning.
relations: Often operates alone or in small groups, may serve other fey or shadow creatures.
environment: Prefers shadowy or dimly lit areas, using darkness to its advantage.
strengths: Exceptional stealth and agility, deadly sneak attacks, immune to poison.
weaknesses: Sunlight sensitivity reduces its effectiveness in bright light.
attacks: Utilizes swift shortsword strikes and long-range bow attacks, dealing piercing and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Assassinate ability enables critical hits against surprised targets.
equipment: Studded leather armor, shortswords, and a longbow.
senses: Has darkvision up to 120 feet, allowing it to see in complete darkness as if it were dim light.
skills: Proficient in stealth and acrobatics, making it a master at sneaking and deception.
additional_information: Can teleport between shadows as a bonus action.
Has advantage on saving throws against being charmed.
Deals additional sneak attack damage under specific conditions.
Advantage on arcana checks related to shadow magic.
test_queries: cunning fey humanoid that uses poison
shadowy assassin that thrives in darkness
elusive humanoid skilled in deception and stealth
